member.summary: Method used to call a BSS Billing API call in order to get various information from the BSS Backend. Function will return the requested "T" type on success, otherwise the default(T) value and the error set to true while on the mean time there might be an error message defined. The "verifyStatusCode" defines if we want to check by default the status of the response and thus define as success or not the whole transaction.

HttpMethod type
BSSBillingVersion enum type,
Guid type
boolean type
string type
bool type
member.returns: Returns

member.name: M:CRMPlatform.Cloud.ServiceManagersSDK.Libraries.CustomConfigs.ControllerCollection.ActionIsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Defines the Actions Status
member.remarks:
Checks for a specific action if it is enabled or not. Incase that the ActionsStatus is set to: - "IncludeAll" then this will return always TRUE - "ExcludeAll" then this will return always FALSE - "IncludeList" will check if the specific action is defined into the actions list and if YES then will return TRUE - "ExcludeList" will check if the specific action is defined into the actions list and if YES the will return FALSE
For more information
member.param: The name of the action
member.returns: True is action is enabled False if action is not enabled

member.name: P:CRMPlatform.Cloud.ServiceManagersSDK.Libraries.CustomConfigs.ControllerCollection.ActionsList
member.summary: Returns a List of Actions Incase that the ActionsStatus is set "IncludeAll" or "ExcludeAll" then this can be empty.
